players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Oh no, Bob is dead! This is terrible. We need to be very careful and figure out who the mafioso is."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of a more suspicious target? That seems odd."
Charlie: "I believe Diana is the detective. Her claim and investigation of Alice make sense to me. We should vote for Alice."
You: "Diana, if you're really the detective, why did you investigate me first? That seems like an odd choice when we had no information. I think you're lying to frame me."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. Charlie, your questioning of my investigation is exactly what the mafia would do to sow doubt. Vote for Alice."
